mapper.sql:
WHERE BOOKNUM>0 AND
SUBJECT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
mapper.select: SELECT NO,SUBJECT,NAME,CREATEDATE,HIT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R , N.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NO>0 ORDER BY NO DESC ) N ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NO, SUBJECT, CONTENTS,NAME,CREATEDATE,HIT) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{subject},#{contents},#{name},SYSDATE,0)
mapper.select: SELECT NO,SUBJECT, CONTENTS,NAME,CREATEDATE,HIT FROM NOTICE WHERE NO=#{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET CONTENTS=#{contents} WHERE NO=#{no}
